frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-panel-world-clock-lite
frozen.shortDescription: A world clock for the panel
frozen.longDescription:
A world clock for the panel

Install gnome-clocks to get started!
Hint: Eiðar has the same time as UTC

Gnome ≤3.14? https://extensions.gnome.org/extension/697/panel-world-clock/
